  • Constructor Details

    • PatientService

      public PatientService() throws IOException
      Default constructor for initializing patient services.
      Throws:
      IOException - if data cannot be loaded from repositories.

  • Method Details

    • displayMedicalRecords

      public void displayMedicalRecords()
      Displays the patient's medical records, including personal details, diagnoses, treatments, and prescriptions.

    • loadPatientInfo

      public void loadPatientInfo(String hospitalId) throws IOException
      Loads patient information based on the hospital ID.
      Parameters:
      hospitalId - the unique identifier for the patient.
      Throws:
      IOException - if patient data cannot be retrieved.

    • displayUpdateContactInformation

      public void displayUpdateContactInformation(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays options to update the patient's contact information.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the contact information cannot be updated.

    • updateContactNo

      public void updateContactNo(String contactNo) throws IOException
      Updates the patient's contact number.
      Parameters:
      contactNo - the new contact number.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the contact number cannot be updated.

    • updateEmail

      public void updateEmail(String email) throws IOException
      Updates the patient's email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the new email address.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the email address cannot be updated.

    • displayUpcomingAppointments

      public void displayUpcomingAppointments(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays the list of upcoming appointments for the patient, with options to reschedule.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - if upcoming appointments cannot be retrieved.

    • displayDoctorsChoiceMenu

      public boolean displayDoctorsChoiceMenu(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays a list of doctors for the patient to choose from for appointment booking.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      Returns:
      true if a time slot is successfully booked; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the list of doctors cannot be retrieved.

    • checkAppointmentSlots

      public boolean checkAppointmentSlots(Scanner scanner, String doctorChoice) throws IOException
      Checks available appointment slots for a selected doctor and books a slot if available.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      doctorChoice - the ID of the selected doctor.
      Returns:
      true if a slot is successfully booked; false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IOException - if appointment slots cannot be retrieved.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      public void rescheduleAppointment(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Reschedules an upcoming appointment for the patient by freeing the current time slot and allowing the patient to select a new appointment with a doctor.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the appointment list or doctors' schedules cannot be retrieved.

    • cancelAppointment

      public void cancelAppointment(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Cancels an upcoming appointment for the patient by freeing the current time slot.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the appointment list cannot be retrieved.

    • displayPastAppointments

      public void displayPastAppointments(Scanner scanner) throws IOException
      Displays the patient's past appointments, showing the diagnosis, treatment, prescription, and the doctor who handled the appointment.
      Parameters:
      scanner - a Scanner for user input (not used in this method but included for consistency).
      Throws:
      IOException - if the patient's medical records cannot be retrieved.
